task.title: How to create a new map
task.shortdesc: Now that you've set up your account let's begin with our first and arguably most important task - creating a new blank map!

context.p: In this task we'll be creating a new map with the Fantasy Regional Classic style. You won't require a paid version of Inkaranate to follow this task. Now without further ado let's begin:

step.cmd: Hover your mouse cursor over to the top right corner and left-click on the "Create New Map" button. Alternatively, if you're in the "My Maps" section you can hover over to the left side of the search bar right under the "My Maps" section where you can find another "Create New Map" button. This will open the "Choose Style" menu.

Now that we're in the choose style menu, scroll down with your mouse wheel, hover your cursor over to the "Fantasy Regional Classic" style and left-click it. Then click the yellow "Choose Style" button at the bottom right corner of the style menu.
Now you'll have to choose your scene settings. For this tutorial guide we suggest you select the "Medium(1K)" resolution option and the "Landscape 40x30 tiles" aspect ration option.
Now that we're ready with our settings, hover your cursor over to the bottom right corner of the scene settings menu and left-click the yellow "Create Map" button.

taskbody.result: After following these steps we've now created our blank canvas where we can explore the tools that are at our disposal. Once you're done with this task move onto the next task - "Using the mask tool".
